short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the Facebook care react with an image chosen by the user

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For those of us that aren't fans of the new Facebook "care" react, now we can replace it with an image of our choosing. Just click on the extension, upload your image, and refresh Facebook! All static copies of the "care" react will be replaced with your shiny new image!
